author: Dianne Musgrove
comment: I love the use of colour and ever-changing design. It also has everything I need on both the sleeping and active faces (date and time). I've tried so many watch faces but always come back to this one. Using on my Huawei watch
title: My go to watch face

author: Ryan Clayton
comment: Such a fun watch face.  Instead of trying to cram every bit of info into a watch face, this creates art on your wrist.  I love that it's moving and constantly changing.  I also haven't noticed any battery hit using this watch face.  Bravo Devs!

author: Shannon Garcia
comment: I really like this face, but the default speed was really distracting after a while. A slow/medium/fast setting or a slider would win me back for sure.
title: Moto 360 2

author: Liam Richards
comment: I only wish the colours could be limited to a specific range or contrast for example, and that while I appreciate the face responds to external speed and light, if the face can be locked at a set speed and draw all over the face regardless of movement as mine can tend to dwindle in the bottom of the watch face and doesn't really seem to respond to my movements at all when drawing the design on.

author: แชมป์/Champ Thanachot piamlapthanaburn
comment: It killed my bateries in less then 4 hours
title: Lights out

author: Kevin Kaufman
comment: This is an amazing watch face. My favorite that I use all the time. The live wallpaper style on a smart watch is very cool and the way the designs change, based on the angle of the watch is beyond other watch faces I've seen. This one is worth the download!

author: Martin Kretz
comment: Nice colors but the changing was just OK. And the font could be a bit sharper. But hey, its free and colorful!
title: Could be better

author: Nick d
comment: Runs fine for a while on my Asus ZenWatch 2, but then becomes power hungry and makes my watch run extremely slow.

author: Benjamin Cook
comment: Works like it says , great we need more like this
title: Moto 360 1st gen

author: Taylor O'Neal
comment: Looks like Google made it. Nexus like.  Update: Damn. It's not updated and no longer compatible with the formerly compatible Moto 360s.  Probably Google's fault but nonetheless.

comment: how can i use it?i installed it but dnt know hot it works?
title: looks gud but😐

author: Allison Law
comment: I love the colours and the animation of this face. Very eye catching.
title: Gorgeous

author: Nathan Stoltenberg
comment: With the latest update, I can finally have this face on my LG Watch Urbane. The Geometric patterns are so unique.

author: Paul Schmardebeck
comment: But power consumption as is with all motion based watch faces, is a little heavier than a basic or fixed face
title: Like the standby face

author: Isaiah Carlson
comment: I love this app!
title: It's beautiful and it has my name in it! (Almost)

comment: Drains the battery so fast

comment: But it's a battery killer

comment: It's beautiful!

comment: I love it. Best watch face I've come across.

comment: Totally love this bright watch face.the watch stands out

comment: Crazy awesome watch face

comment: How to use it

author: Nathan Robinson
comment: Really cool angle look. Love it.

author: M Rosenberg
comment: Everyone loves it!

author: Kyle Renner
comment: Simply Elegant

author: Yip Andrew
comment: Nice

author: David Moodley
comment: Great on Moto360! Excellent, got a tiny bit of lag sometimes, but pretty great overall.
title: Epic! Thanks for 24hr

author: Mitchel Wood
comment: Design is really cool and Androis-like. It just really needs the date under the the time. I could also request things like step counter, etc, but this face deserves to be kept simple and beautiful. But it NEEDS the date. Please!
title: Love it, but can be improved

author: Mr ExtremeTaco
comment: At first it didnt pop up but i waited and it was there and its awesome! I cant stop staring at it
title: Awesome

author: Alec Loudenback
comment: Such as date, calendar, weather
title: Looks great, but would like more information

author: Alexandre Savard
comment: This is really awesome, but you need the option to put the date please. Date is a must for me...

author: Thomas Jablonowski
comment: Doesn't show up in Android Wear or on the watch. Sony smartwatch 3

reply.author: Fathom Information Design
reply.content: We don't have any control over what the Android Wear app does, so we're frustrated by this as well. We compiled the latest version using the latest Android 6 libraries, which shouldn't be necessary, but appears to help this problem. Give it a shot.

title: Looks good

author: Josef Torkelsen
comment: Great design but would also like a date option that displays below the time
title: Great

author: Cheese hotpockets
comment: This should be downloaded on every watch
title: A new generation of watch faces

author: Luis Mazariego
comment: Great watch face, but missing the date

reply.author: Fathom Information Design
reply.content: The new version now includes the date below the time. Enjoy!

title: Missing the date

author: dawn berry
comment: It's great but no date,

reply.author: Fathom Information Design
reply.content: Thanks, and the latest version adds the date beneath the time. Have fun!

title: Me

author: Dan Fontana
comment: :) thanks
title: Awesome

author: Sergey Wain-Fellowes
comment: Wonderful

author: Evan Carmen
comment: This is a watch face, unless it specifically can display my pictures (etc) there's no reason you need access to my files or identity. Shame, looks like it would have been a great watch face.

reply.author: Fathom Information Design
reply.content:
That's because of the Google Play Support Library, which adds several permissions. We're looking into whether we can remove them. 

In the meantime, the full source code is linked from the description so you can see every last nefarious and evil thing that we're doing with your files and identity. 

[update] We've removed the library—all set!

title: Access to my files?
